register.name: TCR_EL1
register.description: The control register for stage 1 of the EL1&0 translation regime.

bitField.name: NFD1
bitField.description: Present only if is implemented.

bitField.name: NFD0
bitField.description: Present only if is implemented.

bitField.name: HWU162
bitField.description: Hardware Use. Indicates IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED hardware use of bit[62] of the stage 1 translation table Block or Page entry for translations using TTBR1_EL1.

bitField.name: HWU161
bitField.description: Hardware Use. Indicates IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED hardware use of bit[61] of the stage 1 translation table Block or Page entry for translations using TTBR1_EL1.

bitField.name: HWU160
bitField.description: Hardware Use. Indicates IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED hardware use of bit[60] of the stage 1 translation table Block or Page entry for translations using TTBR1_EL1.

bitField.name: HWU159
bitField.description: Hardware Use. Indicates IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED hardware use of bit[59] of the stage 1 translation table Block or Page entry for translations using TTBR1_EL1.

bitField.name: HWU062
bitField.description: Hardware Use. Indicates IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED hardware use of bit[62] of the stage 1 translation table Block or Page entry for translations using TTBR0_EL1.

bitField.name: HWU061
bitField.description: Hardware Use. Indicates IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED hardware use of bit[61] of the stage 1 translation table Block or Page entry for translations using TTBR0_EL1.

bitField.name: HWU060
bitField.description: Hardware Use. Indicates IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED hardware use of bit[60] of the stage 1 translation table Block or Page entry for translations using TTBR0_EL1.

bitField.name: HWU059
bitField.description: Hardware Use. Indicates IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED hardware use of bit[59] of the stage 1 translation table Block or Page entry for translations using TTBR0_EL1.

bitField.name: HPD1
bitField.description: Hierarchical Permission Disables. This affects the hierarchical control bits, APTable, PXNTable, and UXNTable, except NSTable, in the translation tables pointed to by TTBR1_EL1.

bitField.name: HPD0
bitField.description: Hierarchical Permission Disables. This affects the hierarchical control bits, APTable, PXNTable, and UXNTable, except NSTable, in the translation tables pointed to by TTBR0_EL1.

bitField.name: HD
bitField.description: Hardware management of dirty state in stage 1 translations from EL0 and EL1.

bitField.name: HA
bitField.description: Hardware Access flag update in stage 1 translations from EL0 and EL1.

bitField.name: TBI1
bitField.description: Top Byte ignored - indicates whether the top byte of an address is used for address match for the TTBR1_EL1 region, or ignored and used for tagged addresses.

bitField.name: TBI0
bitField.description: Top Byte ignored - indicates whether the top byte of an address is used for address match for the TTBR0_EL1 region, or ignored and used for tagged addresses.

bitField.name: AS
bitField.description: ASID Size.

bitField.name: IPS
bitField.description: Intermediate Physical Address Size.

bitField.name: TG1
bitField.description: Granule size for the TTBR1_EL1.

bitField.name: SH1
bitField.description: Shareability attribute for memory associated with translation table walks using TTBR1_EL1.

bitField.name: ORGN1
bitField.description: Outer cacheability attribute for memory associated with translation table walks using TTBR1_EL1.

bitField.name: IRGN1
bitField.description: Inner cacheability attribute for memory associated with translation table walks using TTBR1_EL1.

bitField.name: EPD1
bitField.description: Translation table walk disable for translations using TTBR1_EL1. This bit controls whether a translation table walk is performed on a TLB miss, for an address that is translated using TTBR1_EL1.

bitField.name: A1
bitField.description: Selects whether TTBR0_EL1 or TTBR1_EL1 defines the ASID.

bitField.name: T1SZ
bitField.description: The size offset of the memory region addressed by TTBR1_EL1. The region size is 2^(64-T1SZ) bytes.

bitField.name: TG0
bitField.description: Granule size for the TTBR0_EL1.

bitField.name: SH0
bitField.description: Shareability attribute for memory associated with translation table walks using TTBR0_EL1.

bitField.name: ORGN0
bitField.description: Outer cacheability attribute for memory associated with translation table walks using TTBR0_EL1.

bitField.name: IRGN0
bitField.description: Inner cacheability attribute for memory associated with translation table walks using TTBR0_EL1.

bitField.name: EPD0
bitField.description: Translation table walk disable for translations using TTBR0_EL1. This bit controls whether a translation table walk is performed on a TLB miss, for an address that is translated using TTBR0_EL1.

bitField.name: T0SZ
bitField.description: The size offset of the memory region addressed by TTBR0_EL1. The region size is 2^(64-T0SZ) bytes.

register.name: TCR_EL2
register.description: The control register for stage 1 of the EL2, or EL2&0, translation regime...

bitField.name: TG0
bitField.description: Granule size for the TTBR0_EL2.

bitField.name: SH0
bitField.description: Shareability attribute for memory associated with translation table walks using TTBR0_EL2.

bitField.name: ORGN0
bitField.description: Outer cacheability attribute for memory associated with translation table walks using TTBR0_EL2.

bitField.name: IRGN0
bitField.description: Inner cacheability attribute for memory associated with translation table walks using TTBR0_EL2.

bitField.name: T0SZ
bitField.description: The size offset of the memory region addressed by TTBR0_EL2. The region size is 2^(64-T0SZ) bytes.

tcf:enumItem.description: Perform translation table walks using TTBR1_EL1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Perform_translation_table_walks_using_TTBR1_EL1

tcf:enumItem.description: A TLB miss on an address that is translated using TTBR1_EL1 due to an SVE non-fault access generates a Translation fault. No translation table walk is performed.
tcf:enumItem.name: A_TLB_miss_on_an_address_that_is_translated_using_TTBR1_EL1_due_to_an_SVE_non_fault_access_generates_a_Translation_fault

tcf:enumItem.description: Perform translation table walks using TTBR0_EL1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Perform_translation_table_walks_using_TTBR0_EL1

tcf:enumItem.description: A TLB miss on an address that is translated using TTBR0_EL1 due to an SVE non-fault access generates a Translation fault. No translation table walk is performed.
tcf:enumItem.name: A_TLB_miss_on_an_address_that_is_translated_using_TTBR0_EL1_due_to_an_SVE_non_fault_access_generates_a_Translation_fault

tcf:enumItem.description: For translations using TTBR1_EL1, bit[62] of each stage 1 translation table Block or Page entry cannot be used by hardware for an IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED purpose.
tcf:enumItem.name: For_translations_using_TTBR1_EL1_bit_62_of_each_stage_1_translation_table_Block_or_Page_entry_cannot_be_used_by_hardware_for_an_IMPLEMENTATION_DEFINED_purpose

tcf:enumItem.description: For translations using TTBR1_EL1, bit[62] of each stage 1 translation table Block or Page entry can be used by hardware for an IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED purpose if the value of TCR_EL1.HPD1 is 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: For_translations_using_TTBR1_EL1_bit_62_of_each_stage_1_translation_table_Block_or_Page_entry_can_be_used_by_hardware_for_an_IMPLEMENTATION_DEFINED_purpose_if_the_value_of_TCR_EL1

tcf:enumItem.description: For translations using TTBR1_EL1, bit[61] of each stage 1 translation table Block or Page entry cannot be used by hardware for an IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED purpose.
tcf:enumItem.name: For_translations_using_TTBR1_EL1_bit_61_of_each_stage_1_translation_table_Block_or_Page_entry_cannot_be_used_by_hardware_for_an_IMPLEMENTATION_DEFINED_purpose

tcf:enumItem.description: For translations using TTBR1_EL1, bit[61] of each stage 1 translation table Block or Page entry can be used by hardware for an IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED purpose if the value of TCR_EL1.HPD1 is 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: For_translations_using_TTBR1_EL1_bit_61_of_each_stage_1_translation_table_Block_or_Page_entry_can_be_used_by_hardware_for_an_IMPLEMENTATION_DEFINED_purpose_if_the_value_of_TCR_EL1

tcf:enumItem.description: For translations using TTBR1_EL1, bit[60] of each stage 1 translation table Block or Page entry cannot be used by hardware for an IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED purpose.
tcf:enumItem.name: For_translations_using_TTBR1_EL1_bit_60_of_each_stage_1_translation_table_Block_or_Page_entry_cannot_be_used_by_hardware_for_an_IMPLEMENTATION_DEFINED_purpose

tcf:enumItem.description: For translations using TTBR1_EL1, bit[60] of each stage 1 translation table Block or Page entry can be used by hardware for an IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED purpose if the value of TCR_EL1.HPD1 is 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: For_translations_using_TTBR1_EL1_bit_60_of_each_stage_1_translation_table_Block_or_Page_entry_can_be_used_by_hardware_for_an_IMPLEMENTATION_DEFINED_purpose_if_the_value_of_TCR_EL1

tcf:enumItem.description: For translations using TTBR1_EL1, bit[59] of each stage 1 translation table Block or Page entry cannot be used by hardware for an IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED purpose.
tcf:enumItem.name: For_translations_using_TTBR1_EL1_bit_59_of_each_stage_1_translation_table_Block_or_Page_entry_cannot_be_used_by_hardware_for_an_IMPLEMENTATION_DEFINED_purpose

tcf:enumItem.description: For translations using TTBR1_EL1, bit[59] of each stage 1 translation table Block or Page entry can be used by hardware for an IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED purpose if the value of TCR_EL1.HPD1 is 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: For_translations_using_TTBR1_EL1_bit_59_of_each_stage_1_translation_table_Block_or_Page_entry_can_be_used_by_hardware_for_an_IMPLEMENTATION_DEFINED_purpose_if_the_value_of_TCR_EL1

tcf:enumItem.description: For translations using TTBR0_EL1, bit[62] of each stage 1 translation table Block or Page entry cannot be used by hardware for an IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED purpose.
tcf:enumItem.name: For_translations_using_TTBR0_EL1_bit_62_of_each_stage_1_translation_table_Block_or_Page_entry_cannot_be_used_by_hardware_for_an_IMPLEMENTATION_DEFINED_purpose

tcf:enumItem.description: For translations using TTBR0_EL1, bit[62] of each stage 1 translation table Block or Page entry can be used by hardware for an IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED purpose if the value of TCR_EL1.HPD0 is 1.

tcf:enumItem.name: For_translations_using_TTBR0_EL1_bit_61_of_each_stage_1_translation_table_Block_or_Page_entry_cannot_be_used_by_hardware_for_an_IMPLEMENTATION_DEFINED_purpose

tcf:enumItem.description: For translations using TTBR0_EL1, bit[61] of each stage 1 translation table Block or Page entry can be used by hardware for an IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED purpose if the value of TCR_EL1.HPD0 is 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: For_translations_using_TTBR0_EL1_bit_61_of_each_stage_1_translation_table_Block_or_Page_entry_can_be_used_by_hardware_for_an_IMPLEMENTATION_DEFINED_purpose_if_the_value_of_TCR_EL1

tcf:enumItem.description: Hierarchical permissions are enabled.
tcf:enumItem.name: Hierarchical_permissions_are_enabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Hierarchical permissions are disabled.
tcf:enumItem.name: Hierarchical_permissions_are_disabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Hierarchical permissions are enabled.
tcf:enumItem.name: Hierarchical_permissions_are_enabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Hierarchical permissions are disabled.
tcf:enumItem.name: Hierarchical_permissions_are_disabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Stage 1 hardware management of dirty state disabled.
tcf:enumItem.name: Stage_1_hardware_management_of_dirty_state_disabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Stage 1 hardware management of dirty state enabled, only if the HA bit is also set to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Stage_1_hardware_management_of_dirty_state_enabled_only_if_the_HA_bit_is_also_set_to_1

tcf:enumItem.description: Stage 1 Access flag update disabled.
tcf:enumItem.name: Stage_1_Access_flag_update_disabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Stage 1 Access flag update enabled.
tcf:enumItem.name: Stage_1_Access_flag_update_enabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Top Byte used in the address calculation.
tcf:enumItem.name: Top_Byte_used_in_the_address_calculation

tcf:enumItem.description: Top Byte ignored in the address calculation.
tcf:enumItem.name: Top_Byte_ignored_in_the_address_calculation

tcf:enumItem.description: Top Byte used in the address calculation.
tcf:enumItem.name: Top_Byte_used_in_the_address_calculation

tcf:enumItem.description: Top Byte ignored in the address calculation.
tcf:enumItem.name: Top_Byte_ignored_in_the_address_calculation

tcf:enumItem.description: 8 bit - the upper 8 bits of TTBR0_EL1 and TTBR1_EL1 are ignored by hardware for every purpose except reading back the register, and are treated as if they are all zeros for when used for allocation and matching entries in the TLB.
tcf:enumItem.name: _8_bit_the_upper_8_bits_of_TTBR0_EL1_and_TTBR1_EL1_are_ignored_by_hardware_for_every_purpose_except_reading_back_the_register_and_are_treated_as_if_they_are_all_zeros_for_when_used_for_allocation_and_matching_entries_in_the_TLB

tcf:enumItem.description: 16 bit - the upper 16 bits of TTBR0_EL1 and TTBR1_EL1 are used for allocation and matching in the TLB.
tcf:enumItem.name: _16_bit_the_upper_16_bits_of_TTBR0_EL1_and_TTBR1_EL1_are_used_for_allocation_and_matching_in_the_TLB

tcf:enumItem.description: 32 bits, 4GB.
tcf:enumItem.name: _32_bits_4GB

tcf:enumItem.description: 36 bits, 64GB.
tcf:enumItem.name: _36_bits_64GB

tcf:enumItem.description: 42 bits, 4TB.
tcf:enumItem.name: _42_bits_4TB

tcf:enumItem.description: 44 bits, 16TB.
tcf:enumItem.name: _44_bits_16TB

tcf:enumItem.description: 48 bits, 256TB.
tcf:enumItem.name: _48_bits_256TB

tcf:enumItem.description: 52 bits, 4PB
tcf:enumItem.name: _52_bits_4PB
